mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into USER_TABLE (USER_NAME, PASSWORD, BJTU_EMAIL, BJTU_NUMBER, PHONE, TOTAL_VOLUME, EXISTED_VOLUME, USER_TYPE, USER_STATE, USER_TIME_BUILD, COMMENT) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjtuEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjtuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{existedVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userTimeBuild,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update USER_TABLE set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJTU_EMAIL = #{bjtuEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJTU_NUMBER = #{bjtuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_VOLUME = #{totalVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXISTED_VOLUME = #{existedVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_STATE = #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_TIME_BUILD = #{userTimeBuild,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, BJTU_EMAIL, BJTU_NUMBER, PHONE, TOTAL_VOLUME, EXISTED_VOLUME, USER_TYPE, USER_STATE, USER_TIME_BUILD, COMMENT from USER_TABLE where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, BJTU_EMAIL, BJTU_NUMBER, PHONE, TOTAL_VOLUME, EXISTED_VOLUME, USER_TYPE, USER_STATE, USER_TIME_BUILD, COMMENT from USER_TABLE
